text: Anata wa, hitobito no naka shinko suru mono o tekishi suru koto ga mottomo kibishi no wa, yudayahito to tashinkyo todearu koto o shirudearou. Mata anata wa, shinko suru mono ni ichiban shin'ai no jo o daite iru no wa,`watashi-tachi wa kirisutokyotodesu.' To iu monodearu koto o shirudearou. Kore wa kare-ra no ma ni, shisai to shudo-shi ga ite, kare-ra ga komandenai tamedearu
